info.title: Task Management Platform API
info.description: A cloud-based Task Management & Collaboration Platform API. Supports project management, task tracking with Kanban boards, notifications, and role-based access control.

post.description: Authenticate with email and password to receive a JWT token

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user information

post.description: Logout the current user (client-side token disposal)

get.description: Returns all available mock users for testing. Use these credentials to login.
Get paginated notifications for the current user

Get a paginated list of projects the user has access to

post.description: Create a new project (requires manager or admin role)

get.description: Get a specific project by ID
Get all members of a project

post.description: Add a user to a project

delete.description: Remove a user from a project

get.description: Get a paginated list of tasks for a project

post.description: Create a new task in a project

get.description: Get tasks assigned to the current user
Get all dependencies for a task

delete.description: Remove a dependency from a task

get.description: Get all comments for a task

post.description: Add a comment to a task
